biotools.summary: Generative AI models have shown tremendous usefulness in increasing accessibility and automation of a wide range of tasks. Yet, their application to the biomedical domain is still limited, in part due to the lack of a common framework for deploying, testing, and evaluating the diverse models and auxiliary technologies that are needed. The biochatter Python package is a generic backend library for the connection of biomedical applications to conversational AI. It includes connectivity to knowledge representations generated through the BioCypher knowledge graph package.
